name: Color Strike
description:
Run, dodge, eat and eat again!

Hypercasual game developed in just one day. It is based on an old mobile game called Zampa by ApkSoftware (taken off the stores).

For now, this is just a prototype that I used to test a few tricks of some Unity assets, but I would like to give it a little extra depth (economy, skins, achievements, leaderboards and power ups).

Comments are welcome!
